document.heading: Office of Administrative Hearings Establishment Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-217, the “Office of Administrative Hearings Establishment Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-817, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 29, 2004, and July 13, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 2, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-522 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-217 became effective on December 7, 2004.
